Package ml.alternet.misc

Misc classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CharRange
    Define, merge, and exclude ranges of Unicode characters.
    CharRange.Reversible
    Allow to specify a set of values in terms of inclusion or exclusion.
    Position
    Informations about the position.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CharArray
    A char sequence representation of a char array.
    CharRange.BoundRange
    A single interval with defined start and end boundaries.
    CharRange.Char
    Define a range made of a single character, or made of all characters but one.
    CharRange.Chars
    Define a range of characters made of the characters of a string, either by inclusion or exclusion.
    CharRange.Range
    Define an atomic range of characters.
    CharRange.Ranges
    Define non-overlapping ranges of characters.
    CharRange.UnboundRange
    Base implementation of unbound ranges.
    Invoker
    A class that allow to access members with restricted access.
    JNDIInitialContextFactory
    A factory that supplies an initial context that stores bindings in a map.
    SoftHashMap<K,V>
    A soft map that discards its entry on memory leaks.
    Thrower
    A thrower can "cast" any exception as a RuntimeException without wrapping it.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ScalarType
    The Java basic scalar types.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    OmgException
    As the name suggest, an unforeseen exception that shouldn't be thrown, and therefore that some processing is missing; not as critical as an unexpected exception.
    TodoException
    An exception that indicates that something remains to do in the development.
    WtfException
    As the name suggest, an unexpected exception.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    InfoClass
    Force the retention of package-info.
    ToDo
    Mark things that are to do in the development.

Package ml.alternet.misc Description

Misc classes.
